value: content=Is a charming, small resort right on the unspotted and uncrowded sandy Tangalle beach with an Italian-Sri-Lankan management. The three bungalows, open-air restaurant, as well as other facilities are hidden in the large and carefully maintained tropical garden.

content=Dickwella Resort is truly a Paradise in the south coast of Sri Lanka, surrounded by golden sandy beaches. Fitted with an ocean-view terrace and canopied beds, each of the guestrooms afford you pure comfort. Apart from the distinct décor, other amenities include air-conditioning and a mini-bar. Join the excursions to Galle City, the Mulkirigala Rock Temple, or Yala National Park for a safari adventure. Then pamper with a soothing massage at the Sanctuary Spa. The restaurant’s buffets, fresh seafood, and stone oven-baked pizzas should not be missed as well.

content=A small boutique hotel capturing the views of the Indian Ocean, Turtle Bay is ideally located in Kalamatiya, just a few steps away from the beach. Offering a rustic atmosphere with their wooden furnishings, you will have all the convenience and comfort you seek for in each room. The hotel has a quiet beach, a sauna, an outdoor pool and an Ayurvedic spa. For leisure, you can rent a car or bicycle to explore the surroundings. The onsite restaurants and bar allows you to eat anywhere in the property, even on the beach!
